And it came to pass, when I heard [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8800" /] these words [strongs id="h1697" /], that I sat down [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8804" /] and wept [strongs id="h1058" tvm="8799" /], and mourned [strongs id="h56" tvm="8691" /] [certain] days [strongs id="h3117" /], and fasted [strongs id="h6684" tvm="8802" /], and prayed [strongs id="h6419" tvm="8693" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] the God [strongs id="h430" /] of heaven [strongs id="h8064" /],

O Lord [strongs id="h136" /], I beseech [strongs id="h577" /] thee, let now thine ear [strongs id="h241" /] be attentive [strongs id="h7183" /] to the prayer [strongs id="h8605" /] of thy servant [strongs id="h5650" /], and to the prayer [strongs id="h8605" /] of thy servants [strongs id="h5650" /], who desire [strongs id="h2655" /] to fear [strongs id="h3372" tvm="8800" /] thy name [strongs id="h8034" /]: and prosper [strongs id="h6743" tvm="8685" /], I pray thee, thy servant [strongs id="h5650" /] this day [strongs id="h3117" /], and grant [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8798" /] him mercy [strongs id="h7356" /] in the sight [strongs id="h6440" /] of this man [strongs id="h376" /]. When Sanballat [strongs id="h5571" /] the Horonite [strongs id="h2772" /], and Tobiah [strongs id="h2900" /] the servant [strongs id="h5650" /], the Ammonite [strongs id="h5984" /], heard [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8799" /] [of it], it grieved [strongs id="h3415" tvm="8799" /] them exceedingly [strongs id="h7451" /] [strongs id="h1419" /] that there was come [strongs id="h935" tvm="8804" /] a man [strongs id="h120" /] to seek [strongs id="h1245" tvm="8763" /] the welfare [strongs id="h2896" /] of the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /].
